issue.title: [C++][Compute] Support hash_aggregate with only keys
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15609](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15609). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, hash_aggregate requires keys, arguments and aggregation function, sometimes a user wants to execute group by without any aggregation functions.
